What you need for your baby
Bathing
It is a personal choice how 
frequently you bathe your baby; 
a wash will often be enough 
to keep your baby clean and 
ensure they are comfortable. 
Some babies enjoy the bath 
and for some a warm bath may 
help them to sleep.
You will need:
• A baby bath or any large, 
clean bowl.
• Two towels, the softer the 
better. Keep them only for 
your baby’s use. There is 
no need for special baby 
towels, unless you want 
them.
